Reshaping Your Future APCO 2011 l Philadelphia, PA
We get it - you have too many calls, not enough staff and too much pressure. Making sense of the future is our business. We're helping public safety agencies reshape the way they manage information to help them focus on what's important. Do you think your 9-1-1 center needs to be reshaped?
TriTech Software Systems invites you to reshape your future with a complimentary Exhibit Hall One Day Expo Pass to APCO. We'll show you how our CAD and Mobile solutions are helping our clients reshape the way they manage information.
Instructions to register for your free Exhibit Hall One Day Only Expo Pass*: Go to: https://s3.goeshow.com/apco/annual/2011.registration.cfm Fill out your contact information and enter the following number in the Promotion Code field 272DCIJ4. Complete the registration form. Note: The discount will not be reflected until the person reaches the page where every item selected is summarized. See It . Believe It. Experience It. Booth 1025.
*One day exhibit hall only pass. It does not allow access to any other confrence related events outside the exhibit hall.
